Questions.Question: Which country is home to the famous music festival 'Glastonbury'?
Questions.Explanation: Glastonbury is held in the United Kingdom and is one of the largest and most iconic music festivals in the world.

Questions.Question: In which city is the music festival 'Coachella' held?
Questions.Explanation: Coachella takes place in Indio, California, attracting thousands of music lovers from around the globe.

Questions.Question: Which country hosts the music festival 'Tomorrowland'?
Questions.Explanation: Tomorrowland is held in Belgium and is renowned for its extravagant stages and electronic music lineup.

Questions.Question: Which city is home to the music festival 'Lollapalooza'?
Questions.Explanation: Lollapalooza originated in Chicago and has since expanded to various cities around the world.

Questions.Question: Which country is the birthplace of the music festival 'Burning Man'?
Questions.Explanation: Burning Man was first held in the United States and has become a unique cultural event in the Nevada desert.

Questions.Question: In which country is the music festival 'Roskilde' held?
Questions.Explanation: Roskilde takes place in Denmark and is one of the oldest and largest music festivals in Europe.

Questions.Question: Which city hosts the music festival 'Splendour in the Grass'?
Questions.Explanation: Splendour in the Grass is held in Byron Bay, a coastal town in New South Wales, Australia.

Questions.Question: Which country is home to the music festival 'Sziget'?
Questions.Explanation: Sziget is held in Hungary and is known for its diverse lineup and vibrant atmosphere on an island in the Danube River.

Questions.Question: In which country is the music festival 'Rock in Rio' held?
Questions.Explanation: Rock in Rio takes place in Brazil and is one of the largest music festivals in the world, attracting top international artists.

Questions.Question: Which city hosts the music festival 'Reading and Leeds'?
Questions.Explanation: Reading and Leeds festivals are held in Reading and Leeds, two cities in England, simultaneously.

Questions.Question: Which country is home to the music festival 'Ultra Europe'?
Questions.Explanation: Ultra Europe is held in Croatia and is a popular electronic music festival attracting partygoers from all over the world.

Questions.Question: In which country is the music festival 'Fuji Rock' held?
Questions.Explanation: Fuji Rock takes place in Japan and is known for its scenic location at the Naeba Ski Resort.

Questions.Question: Which city hosts the music festival 'Primavera Sound'?
Questions.Explanation: Primavera Sound is held in Barcelona, Spain, and showcases a diverse range of musical genres.

Questions.Question: Which country is home to the music festival 'Electric Daisy Carnival'?
Questions.Explanation: Electric Daisy Carnival originated in the United States and has since expanded to various locations worldwide.

Questions.Question: In which country is the music festival 'Mawazine' held?
Questions.Explanation: Mawazine takes place in Morocco and is the largest music festival in Africa, attracting both local and international artists.

Questions.Question: Which city hosts the music festival 'Sónar'?
Questions.Explanation: Sónar is held in Barcelona, Spain, and is renowned for its focus on electronic and experimental music.

Questions.Question: Which country is home to the music festival 'Splendour in the Grass'?
Questions.Explanation: Splendour in the Grass is held in Australia and showcases a mix of local and international artists.

Questions.Question: In which country is the music festival 'Exit' held?
Questions.Explanation: Exit takes place in Serbia and is known for its unique location within the Petrovaradin Fortress in Novi Sad.

Questions.Question: Which city hosts the music festival 'Austin City Limits'?
Questions.Explanation: Austin City Limits is held in Austin, Texas, and showcases a diverse range of musical genres.

Questions.Question: Which country is home to the music festival 'Download'?
Questions.Explanation: Download is held in the United Kingdom and is one of the largest rock and metal music festivals in the world.
